comments.text:
This bug doesn't have a detailed description yet, but the idea is to provide *something* that helps people watch for JS changes in the mozilla-central pushlog. Despite the open-ended nature of the bug, I do want us to come to a resolution fairly promptly, so that we can shut down the old repo and get things squared away. So, keep it simple.

Chris, you've been doing some work on this already--want to refine and drive?

(Side note: I discovered that |hg log -I js/src/**| gives the log of changes that affect js/src.)
comments.author: dmandelin@mozilla.com
comments.creator: dmandelin@mozilla.com

comments.text: I was on this, i wanted to use pulse.mozilla.org and write something for node.js. But i can't get it to work for some reason.
